CustomField.description: Estimated Fluctuation Rate in Share of Employees/Year. Dependant on HeyJobs Category. Used for Wallez Size Calculation. RO-529 , RO - 1914
CustomField.formula: CASE( HeyJobs_Category__c, "Call center", 0.284, "Logistics", 0.184, "Retail", 0.219, "Temporary Employment Agencies", 0, "Services", 0.370, "Hospitality", 0.302, "e-commerce", 0.170, "Healthcare", 0.195, "Production", 0.178, "Banking and Insurance", 0.096, "Agency", 0.176, "High-End", 0.126, "Headhunter", 0.132, "Office", 0.132, "Public Sector", 0.137, 0.176 )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Estimated Fluctuation Rate in Share of Employees/Year. Dependant on HeyJobs Category. Used for Wallez Size Calculation.
CustomField.label: Legacy Employee Fluctuation Rate
